sentences.en: A Federal Court case had been fast tracked to Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 联邦法庭的一桩案件提前到星期三审理。

sentences.en: Anne vanished from outside her home last Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 安妮上周三突然在家门外失踪了。

sentences.en: Come and have supper with us on Wednesday, if you're free.
sentences.cn: 如果你有空的话，周三晚上来和我们一起吃晚饭吧。

sentences.en: He undertook to finish the job by Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 他答应在星期三以前完成这项工作。

sentences.en: Meanwhile the race is on to resurface the road before next Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 与此同时正赶着在下周三之前把路面重新铺好。

sentences.en: Middle East peace talks reopen in Washington on Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 中东和平谈判于周三在华盛顿重启。

sentences.en: On the Wednesday she got worse.
sentences.cn: 这个星期三,她病得更严重了.

sentences.en: Roland Nilsson last night backed Sheffield Wednesday to win the UEFA Cup.
sentences.cn: 昨晚罗兰·尼尔森打赌谢菲尔德周三队会捧得欧洲联盟杯。

sentences.en: She'll go to China Wednesday week.
sentences.cn: 她将在下下个星期三去中国.

sentences.en: Steve had told her that he'dbeen in an accident on Wednesday night.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫已经告诉过她自己周三晚上出了事故。

sentences.en: The capital has been without mains water since Wednesday night.
sentences.cn: 从周三晚上开始，首都就停水了。

sentences.en: The foreign guests will call on you next Wednesday afternoon.
sentences.cn: 外宾将在下周星期三下午拜访你。

sentences.en: The lady returned from Boston Wednesday week.
sentences.cn: 这位女士是上上个星期三从波士顿回来的.

sentences.en: They have to vacate their offices before Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 他们必须在星期三以前将办公室腾出来。

sentences.en: We let the mending accumulate until Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 我们让需缝补的衣服一直积存到星期三.

sentences.en: Wednesday's Prom featured the London Mozart Players.
sentences.cn: 周三音乐会为伦敦莫扎特音乐家乐团专场。

phrases.tran_cn: [基督教]圣灰星期三（复活节前的第七个星期三）

trans.tran_en: the day between Tuesday and Thursday
the day between Tuesday and Thursday
